description: The Belkin Headphone Splitter lets you connect two stereo headphones into a single mini-stereo jack on your iPod, MP3 player, or any device with a 3.5-mm audio jack. With the splitter, you and your friend can listen to music at the same time.The Belkin Headphone Splitter is about six inches long and is colored white to match your iPod. The connector plugs are nickel-plated to prevent corrosion. The Belkin Headphone Splitter is backed by a lifetime warranty.
title: Belkin F8V234-WHT-APL Headphone Splitter (Discontinued by Manufacturer)
